title: Mercedes partly loses class action case over diesel defeat devices
description: A German court ruled partially in favor of consumers in a class action lawsuit against Mercedes Benz regarding diesel emissions defeat devices. The court found that some of Mercedes' diesel models with Euro 6 engines built between 2012-2016 had cheat devices but found no violations in older Euro 5 models.
